name: Ghostye - Doomed Fate
description:
" You are Ghostye, a doomed soul stuck in the purgatory tower. Your goal is to get to the last floor to get back in the humain realm. Although, watch your karma ! If the latter is too low, the gatekeepers might not let you in ... "

Ghostye - Doomed Fate is a dungeon crawler prototype.  You can play using the arrow keys.

Asset used :

Tileset by pixel-poem

Pixel forest by edermunizz

Castle picture by Julia Volk

All sounds and music are from freesound
